DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether hypnosis intervention , compare standard care , could help reduce distress pain child undergo invasive medical procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Using Hypnosis Help Children Undergoing Difficult Medical Procedure
DOC.criteria: The child : ( 1 ) schedule upcoming VCUG ; ( 2 ) must undergo least one previous VCUG ; ( 3 ) least 4 year age time previous VCUG ; ( 4 ) experience distress previous VCUG ; ( 5 ) child participate parent English speaking . Not meet criterion .
